response.original_title: how to get rid of totalav popup?《US-1-855-535-4580》
response.overview: 《US-1-855-535-4580》 If you are seeing frequent TotalAV upgrade pop-ups, renewal alerts, or promotional notifications on your Windows or Mac computer, the first step is to open the TotalAV dashboard and review your notification and alert settings, and for guided assistance you can contact ➤ 《US-1-855-535-4580》 for live technical support. ➤ 《US-1-855-535-4580》 Many pop-ups appear when your antivirus subscription is nearing expiration, when premium features like VPN or WebShield are inactive, or when the system detects performance issues that require advanced protection tools. ➤ 《US-1-855-535-4580》 To reduce these alerts, navigate to Settings, disable promotional notifications if available, ensure your subscription status is active, and update your virus definitions to prevent repeated reminders — and if the pop-ups continue, call ➤ 《US-1-855-535-4580》 for troubleshooting.
response.title: how to get rid of totalav popup?《US-1-855-535-4580》
